attributes.action: Make it a legal requirement for vets to scan pets for microchips on every visit.
attributes.additional_details: My cat, Portia, went missing three months ago. I am convinced that someone has her and is not getting her scanned. I need her back so much, and other owners of missing pets feel the same.
attributes.background: If it is routine practice for vets to scan animals for microchips, it will crack down on pet theft, and bring missing pets back to heartbroken owners faster and easier.
